–§–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: Remote
–ó–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å: Full-time
–ó–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω–∞—è –≤–∏–ª–∫–∞: 5,000 - 6,000$ NET
–ö–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç—ã: recruitment@picstar.co
https://picstar.co/page22113925.html

About employer and position :
We are a well-funded product company with a fully distributed team (10+ people), that built the first version of social travel app that lets users get their inspiration, make travel plans, find cool spots nearby, take beautiful photos and share all these beautiful moments with their friends.

We are looking for an experienced Senior Mobile Developer, with comprehensive experience in building mobile apps with React Native, to join our team.

Responsibilities :
* Integrate new features based on the product's roadmap.
* Design interfaces to improve user experience.
* Write unit and UI tests to identify malfunctions.
* Write technical documentation.
* Troubleshoot and debug to optimize performance.
* Code review for peers.
* Debugging.

Requirements :
* 4+ years of experience as a Mobile Developer.
* 3+ years of experience with building mobile apps with React Native.
* Experience with mobile app optimizations.
* Strong experience with TypeScript.
* Knowledge of version control (Git).

Nice to have :
* Experience with integrating dynamic links, event tracking and other third-parties tools for mobile apps.
* Experience with animations in React Native.
* Familiar with mobile app prototyping tools (Figma).

Recruiting process :
1. 20 minutes introduction call.
2. Technical test. The React Native assignment takes around 4 hours to be completed. You have 24 hours to complete it from the moment when you receive the test. We will decide together when it's the best moment to send it to you.
3. Technical discussion.
4. Offer

Benefits :
* Full remote job;
* Competitive USD salary with regular reviews;
* $4,000 annual personal budget for employee benefits (private health insurance, fitness subscription, training courses etc.);
* 20 paid vacation days;
* Flexible working hours;
* Zero bureaucracy;
* The environment of high-level experts;
* A nimble, relaxed, and dynamic startup environment.

To apply please send your CV to recruitment@picstar.co

#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #middle #senior #blockchain #js #fullstack #—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ #remote
–ü–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏—è: Fullstack JS / Blockchain Developer
–ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è: Enigma ( enigma.co or scrt.network )
–§–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ
–í–∏–ª–∫–∞: $5000-$6000

Enigma is a Blockchain company, building and developing Secret Network - the first blockchain with privacy. We're based in Tel Aviv, Israel but work with partners all across the world.
We're looking for a blockchain developer with 1 year of experience with various blockchain technologies , and a total of 3 years in software development across both front and backend software stacks.
Our goal is to expand our team to be able to develop more applications for Secret Network, improve our current applications, as well as develop new features and capabilities for developers that use Secret Network in order to drive adoption, and expand our ecosystem.
On the tech side our apps are written in JS/TS (client/server side), and some Rust if Smart Contracts are needed (no Rust experience required).

‚Äã #–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #react #html #css

Remote Mid-Level & Senior Frontend Developers

Fully remote
Full-time/Salary: 15K - 35K USD per year
–°ompany: Fun Ecom/SaaS Co

- Do you love working with exclusively high-quality developers in a "It's ready when it's ready" kind of environment?
- Do you like coding for long stretches of time without interruption?
- Do you thrive in a high-stress environment filled with political infighting, bureaucracy, and corporate nonsense?

If so, then we are the place for you, except you might hate how nice of a company we have - filled with happy, generally competent people that don‚Äôt put up with jerks. Frankly, it makes me sick how nice everyone is.

What will I actually be doing?

- Build web pages in React, HTML, and CSS
- Write unit tests
- Perform code reviews
- Assist in several Documentation and Quality Assurance tasks
- Collaborate with the rest of the engineering team to design and launch new features.

Like everyone else in the company, you will also need to innovate regularly - which means figuring out ways to improve quality and production speed.

What tech stack do you use exactly?

We use Typescript, React, Node, GCP, AWS, Redis, MySQL, Circle CI, GraphQL and MongoDB.

Do I need to know the entire stack?

Of course not! We still have no idea why some people even expect that. You should know React and Node pretty damn well. Beyond that, as long as you are willing to learn, you should be fine.

CompStak envisions a commercial real estate industry where accurate and transparent data leads to better, faster deals for everyone. We gather critical information that is hard to access, then make it instantly and seamlessly available to our platform members.

Launched in 2012, we‚Äôve built a network of 25,000 brokers, appraisers and research professionals across the country, using a unique crowdsourced model. Our clients enjoy the foremost lease and sale transaction data combined with a robust analytics platform. CompStak‚Äôs unique data and intuitive platform is used by the world‚Äôs largest real estate investors, lenders, brokers and appraisers to compare properties, underwrite investments and loans, close deals and track market trends.

CompStak has over 100 team members in the US and overseas, and we continue to grow. We‚Äôre backed by top VCs and industry players like Canaan Partners, IA Capital, Transamerica, Moody‚Äôs, RealPage, 500 Startups, and Daily Mail Group, and have raised over $30m to date. Our HQ is in New York City, and we have regional offices in Atlanta, Chicago, Los Angeles, and Belgrade.

About the role
We are expanding our tech team in Europe and looking for a talented Sr Frontend Engineer to help us bring our unique data products to the market. This is a remote full time opportunity. It‚Äôs open for candidates from any Central or Estern European country. What you will work on will challenge the status quo and change our industry forever.

React/Redux with redux-thunk, all the babel goodness
CSS Modules
High speed maps with MapBox GL
Big data visualizations
Zero configuration dev environment with Webpack builds
Docker based testing environments are automatically created for every PR
Jest and Enzyme unit tests run on every PR
A full suite of Selenium tests (that you won‚Äôt have to touch).

Who are you?
As our Sr Frontend Engineer you will have a minimum 5 years of experience with a proven track record of delivering high quality maintainable software services and or products. At CompStak we provide an amazing environment for your continuous personal and professional growth and in return we hope that:
You are interested in data-driven products
Your professional mission is to develop rock-solid systems and write clean and maintainable code
You are focused on solving problems via well designed composable systems
You are interested in working in a lean startup environment
You are always eager to learn no matter the depth of your experience
You are a kind person who has easy time collaborating with other people
You are happy to mentor less experienced gifted engineers
You are either a designer who grew into a developer and didn‚Äôt look back OR have a degree in Computer Science
You have experience with React, Redux, and CSS Modules
You value simplicity of code and code craftsmanship
You can write a good readme and great pull request.

We are looking for a ReactJS developers for a full-time position, remotely, very long-term.
We are ready to consider from Strong Junior, up to Senior candidates.

For this specific position, we are able to pay up to 3250 EURO per month depending on your skills.

The main requirements for an ideal Middle:
- More than 3 years of practical experience with web standards: HTML, CSS, JS, and React;
- Understanding of web technologies and W3C standards, as well as of programming concepts and web architecture;
- Familiarity with RESTful APIs;
- Familiarity with newer specifications of EcmaScript;
- Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model;
- Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux, Mobx);
- Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements.

The main requirements for an ideal Senior:
- More than 5 years of practical experience with web standards: HTML, CSS, JS, and at least 2 years with React;
- Understanding of web technologies and W3C standards, as well as of programming concepts and web architecture;
- Experience in writing unit-tests to validate the code based on functional specs;
- Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model;
- Through understanding of React.js and its core principles;
- Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux, Mobx);
- Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools;
- Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc.
- Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements.

Nice to have for Middles:
- UX and UI understanding and use of best practices;
- Knowledge of Design patterns and data structures.

Nice to have for Seniors:
- Mentoring and technical leading skills;
- UX and UI understanding and use of best practices;
- Knowledge of Design patterns and data structures.

Your responsibilities will be:
- Developing new user-facing features using React.js ;
- Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use;
- Translating designs and wireframes into high quality code;
- Optimizing components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers;
- Write, audit, and improve our test coverage;
- Document and refactor our frontend codebase Profile and improve our frontend performance.

IMPORTANT: The project itself is an Adult Chat. Which handle daily about 3-4 Millions of users. (Yes, per day it‚Äôs not a mistake) With more than 40K active streams, at any point of time. The amount of work is very high, so we need some extra hands on it. We care only about the downtime, so you for sure we‚Äôll enjoy our friendly team.

You‚Äôll work along with few other developers, from Romania with main working timezone: GMT+2/GMT+3 (Summer Time).
We use Agile/Scrum methodology for our working process.

The hiring process is next:
- A first short call with our C-level to meet each other. (About 30 mins.)
- Second call with our HR and one of our managers. (About 30 mins.)
- Second technical interview to test a bit of your knowledge. (About 60 mins.)
- The job offer itself and the contract to sign.

The expected time to start is ASAP but we are ready to wait for you up to 2-4 weeks, after our last interview.
The entire process should took only few days.

If you find it interesting, please share your CV in English, and let me know the soonest time when you may be available for a call. (Please include the timezone.)

from $4500 to $6000 (netto) or higher, depends on you ;)

Fullstack Blockchain Developer

Description
We‚Äôre looking for a talented, motivated Fullstack developer with hands-on dApps and frontend development experience, and a good understanding of blockchain technologies for a long-term blockchain protocol in the Decentralized Finance space. We are looking for someone who is passionate about Blockchain and DeFi.

Primex Finance is the new decentralized liquidity protocol for cross-margin trading on DEXes built on Ethereum and Polkadot. Primex is backed by some of the world‚Äôs top crypto VCs.

Requirements:

- Being available for full-time;
- Seniority - middle+ /senior ;
- 4+ years in React.js, and Node.js;
- Experience working in DeFi frontend development;
- Understand the flow of the web3 application;
- Confirmed experience in commercial blockchain solutions over 2 years;
- Fast learner with good problem solving and analytical skills;
- English: Upper - Intermediate (Spoken);
- Development experience with JavaScript & Typescript.

Would be nice:

- Provable experience delivering high quality, functional code;
- Experience with Solidity;
- An understanding of DeFi mechanisms and related utilities, e.g. liquidity pools, AMMs and bonding curves, DAOs, Uniswap, SushiSwap, Aave;
- Understand how to interact with solidity contracts- Call functions, get properties, check the status of the submitted transaction using web3.js;
- A background in economics, finance, banking, or a similar relevant field;
- Experience working in the DeFi ecosystem; or an avid DeFi user actively; participating in the space, with a clear understanding of the financial concepts involved;
- A degree in computer science or relevant field or comparable experience;
- Knowledge of ABI (eg. variable mapping to storage slots).

Responsibilities:

- Integrate interaction with blockchain into React frontend app to support the functionality of several smart contracts;
- Develop keepers of margin trade process (Decentralized backend);
- Develop, test and deploy protocol improvements and optimizations as we move forward on our roadmap;
- Develop high-quality code that is maintainable, performant, and accessible;
- Cover by unit tests;
- Integrate with existing DeFi protocols;
- Research different existing DeFi protocols;
- Write documentation, design flow diagrams, and review PRs;
- Research, design, scope, and estimate what you need to do;
- Build reusable cross-chain libraries;
- Integrate your own UI/UX improvements to incentivize the users to use the platform;
- Work with the state-of-the-art developer stack.
- Constantly improve yourself by keeping up to date with the latest technologies trends.

We offer:

- Remote and flexible work hours;
- Long-term and stable employment;
- Cool distributed app project;
- Competitive salary;
- Personal and professional growth;
- Professional IT events compensation;
- Account management of your contractor entity;
- Paid vacation and sick days-off;

–ò—â–µ–º middle/senior —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∞ –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É –Ω–∞ —Å—Ç–µ–∫ React.js + Next.js, –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–µ–π –±—É–¥–µ—Ç —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤—ã—Ö —Ñ–∏—á –ø–æ–¥ –≤–µ–± –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏—é –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è. –ú—ã —Ö–æ—Ç–∏–º —É–ª—É—á—à–∞—Ç—å —á–∞—Ç—ã –≤ –≤–µ–±–µ, —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–π –∫–∞–±–∏–Ω–µ—Ç –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è, –≥–¥–µ –æ–Ω –æ—Ç–∫–ª–∏–∫–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—ë—Ç –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã, —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç —Å–æ —Å–≤–æ–∏–º–∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç–∞–º–∏.

–ñ–¥—ë–º –æ—Ç –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç–∞ —Ö–æ—Ä–æ—à–µ–≥–æ —Å–µ–ª—Ñ-–º–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞, —É–º–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ –¥–µ–∫–æ–º–ø–æ–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ (–Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ –±—ã—Ç—å –∞–≤—Ç–æ–Ω–æ–º–Ω—ã–º).
–ò–∑ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö —Å–∫–∏–ª–ª–æ–≤: React, MobX, –æ—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ JS, Typescript. –ñ–µ–ª–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–º—è–º–∏ –æ—Ç 2 –ª–µ—Ç, –Ω–æ —Ä–∞—Å—Å–º–∞—Ç—Ä–∏–≤–∞–µ–º –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ —Å –º–µ–Ω—å—à–∏–º –æ–ø—ã—Ç–æ–º.

–ö–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç—ã: @masachusok

Adtech platform is looking for a Senior Back-end Developer .By senior dev we mean not only experience in years, but mostly type of thinking, to define and solve complex issues.

As a senior backend developer, you will be responsible for designing and implementing apps, including:

 - Advertising pipeline. Several high load web services and other backend apps to handle data from it;
- Services syncs. Our platform is integrated with various 3d party services, such as CRM‚Äôs, data providers;
- Processing statistics. We have several apps which are handling stats data streams and joining different data to provide advanced analytics for the end users;
- As a senior you will be involved in the review process for other tasks.


Requirements:
 - Experience with high load HTTP webservices development;
- Good knowledge, experience with: Node.js (express), PostgreSQL, Clickhouse, gRPC;
- Work in the Moscow time zone with a difference of not more than 2 hours.

Terms of work:
 - Remote work with a salary in dollars.

Working at Amity is an opportunity to step up your career in a global tech scale-up on a journey to become a tech unicorn.
Backed by leading VC firms with more than $30M funding raised to date, Amity aims to become one of the world‚Äôs largest operators of social networks and social experiences.

ü¶Ñ Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ You will be often required to deliver the most complicated core features of the product.
‚Ä¢ As a Lead, you will be responsible to maintain a horizontal view over the multiple projects of the product; make sure to maintain coherence between the different projects in both functionalities and technical approaches, and support their team in their implementation.
‚Ä¢ You will mentor and support your team in operational tasks such as defining processes for the team to collaborate as well as more hands-on tasks like setting up CI for the projects, reviewing critical pull requests and so on.
‚Ä¢ As a Senior Engineer, you will be able to navigate through each project of the product with ease to operate on them by yourself when time is needed. Therefore, the position requires strong knowledge in Javascript and Typescript in general, but also a deep understanding of the codebase of each project.
‚Ä¢ You will drive the quality of the delivered web applications of the whole Product Line.

ü¶Ñ Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Experience in shipping SDKs/libraries, understanding the challenges of a UI-less product.
‚Ä¢ Previous experience in leading and managing engineering teams: mentoring, coaching, and supporting other team members.
‚Ä¢ Previous experience in taking technical ownership over big products and driving architectural decisions.
‚Ä¢ Previous experience in driving new processes and automation in the scaling engineering team.
‚Ä¢ Profound production experience with JavaScript/TypeScript/HTML/CSS (5+ years)
‚Ä¢ Profound production experience with React.js (3+ years) and with one of the JavaScript framework besides React.js
‚Ä¢ Profound production experience with JavaScript state management tools, such as Redux or MobX (3+ years)
‚Ä¢ Profound experience with testing and bundling Javascript code
‚Ä¢ Experience in building and delivering complex SPA to the production
‚Ä¢ Experience in building real-time applications
‚Ä¢ Experience with any major UI Library (Ant Design is a plus)
‚Ä¢ Experience in building high-loaded Web Applications with thousands of active users.
‚Ä¢ Previous experience with startups or large enterprise companies (to understand the processes and nuances of rolling out technologies)
‚Ä¢ Comfortable with rapid development cycles and agile processes.
‚Ä¢ You have a ‚Äúnever-stop-learning‚Äù attitude and a desire to develop and grow
‚Ä¢ Advanced English language skills (both verbal and written) are required to be successful in this role.

ü¶Ñ What‚Äôs in it for you:
Comprehensive¬†Life Assurance & Private Healthcare¬†insurance package for you and your family (Muang Thai Life).
Flexible working hours, Possibility to work from home or from our gorgeous HQs.
Unlimited paid vacation days.
Travel perks¬†from AirAsia, Opportunities to work from all other offices around the world.
Free breakfast daily¬†& Company¬†lunch 2x a week, Monthly¬†team outings,¬†Happy hours,¬†and regular company bonding activities.
MAC/Windows high-quality¬†equipment,¬†Free English and Thai¬†language classes.
Virgin Active gym¬†discounts, Free Thai massage in the office, Employee Assistance Program (Amity Mind).
Visibility of your results and¬†direct impact on the product.
A collaborative, respectful environment where your voice will always be heard.
Many More ‚Äì We have a whole team dedicated to making Amity an¬†awesome place to work!

We value your personal growth , and we support you by creating the environment for it.

In our team, you will work with different eCommerce projects and brands, using all your skillset. You will be able to improve your frontend skills from HTML and JavaScript to React and Node JS.

We want to work with positive-minded people¬†

Strong worth ethic and keen to detail

Superb troubleshooting and debugging skills

Experience with React/Vue or Knockout.js is a plus

Remote team or joining the in-house team

Salary: 5 000 - 5 800 EUR gross, tax calculator: https://salaryaftertax.com/de/salary-calculator

–¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è:

–£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è:

‚Ä¢–í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–≤–æ–π –ø–æ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∞–ª –≤–Ω–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤: –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –∫–æ–º—å—é–Ω–∏—Ç–∏, –º–∏—Ç–∞–ø—ã –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∏, –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º—ã –º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –∏ –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ–µ –¥—Ä—É–≥–æ–µ

‚Ä¢–ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫—É –∫–∞—Ä—å–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞
‚Ä¢–°–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—É—é –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º—É –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è, –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä, —É—á–µ–±–Ω—ã–π –ø–æ—Ä—Ç–∞–ª —Å –æ–≥—Ä–æ–º–Ω—ã–º –∫–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º –∫—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤, —É –Ω–∞—Å –¥–∞–∂–µ –µ—Å—Ç—å –®–∫–æ–ª–∞ –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–≤

–¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è:

–ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º:

–û–±—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏:

–ö–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç—Å–∫–∞—è –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–∫–æ—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü;

–£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è:
–ü—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –∏–∑ 250+ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤, –ø–µ—Ä—Å–ø–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤—ã –∫–∞—Ä—å–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞;

About Only1

Founded in 2021, Only1 is the first NFT-powered social media built on Solana - the most scalable blockchain to date. Social media users want to feel more connected with creators on platforms. And in conventional social media, creators have to go through middle-man to sell merchandise, paid advertisements, shout-outs, or any form of partnerships. Our innovation through NFT aims to cut out the need for these middle-man, and we do this through two novel NFT applications - Genesis-NFT & Content-NFT farming.

With the support from prestigious/major VCs including Alameda Research, Liquefy, GBV, Bithumb, Gate.io and many more, we are hoping to expand our team. Should you want to explore the blockchain industry and be a part of an international, dynamic and fast moving team, come join the Only1 team!

About The Role
- Work on the main React application;
- Write the code for expressive and innovative UI/UX;
- Develop reusable components and help maintain our component library;
- You will introduce new solutions and optimize existing ones;
- Create libraries, components and tools to ensure maximum performance with a top-notch user experience.

Requirements
- Experience with Nextjs, React, NodeJS, Typescript;
- Experience working with hooks, styled-components;
- Experience with blockchain API libraries is a plus;
- At least 5 years experience as a frontend engineer;
- Strong interpersonal and communication skills;
- Good command of written and spoken English;
- Ability to work in an agile, energetic startup environment.

As a Senior Frontend Developer (Dashboard) you will be part of our Dashboard team, a multidisciplinary, agile and specialized team. Your primary responsibility will be the planning, development and maintenance of our Dashboard application: a modern React and Angular 1 hybrid currently transitioning towards React as well. You'll be part of a team that has a direct impact on our product, user experience and technology choices.

* Take full ownership of our client-side applications and write expressive and testable code in reasonably sized units of work

* Monitor the application to ensure the best experience for our users
* Take part in technical discussions and contribute with your ideas and experience

* Experience with Flux architecture

* Experience working with Design Systems and Microfrontend architecture is a plus

‚úÖ What‚Äôs in it for you:

* Flexible, family-friendly work schedule and vacation policy

–†–µ–∫—Ä—É—Ç–∏–Ω–≥–æ–≤–æ–µ –∞–≥–µ–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–æ Remokate, –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è –≤ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—é Derivco —Å —Ä–µ–ª–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π –≤ –¢–∞–ª–ª–∏–Ω, –≠—Å—Ç–æ–Ω–∏—è https://derivco.com

–û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏:

Derivco is a leading software development house that designs and develops trailblazing technology for one of the world‚Äôs biggest suppliers of online gambling. In Derivco Estonia people develop and care for people, while working hard and smart to produce world leading innovative and exciting products. Derivco Estonia delivers a legendary gaming experience.
Are you ready for something fresh and exciting, a chance to dive into some cool, new tech? We‚Äôve just opened a position for a creative¬† Senior JavaScript Developer ¬†in one of our most innovative and groundbreaking product teams!¬†
You‚Äôll be heavily involved in cuttingedge video streaming technology, working with the industry‚Äôs pioneering developers, video production specialists and artists to solve truly intriguing and meaningful tech problems.¬†
Beyond software development, the position involves reviewing code, spearheading improvements, spotting problem areas, coaching junior colleagues and sharing knowledge outside your team.

What you will need to succeed?
- Extensive experience using various JavaScript/TypeScript frameworks, including at least 3 years with ECMAScript 6
- Familiarity with PixiJS or PhaserJS renderer
- Experience with functional reactive programming (RxJS), version control systems (Git, Subversion, etc.), Node.js, graphics programming and audio/video file formats
- Experience with at least two of the following: React, Angular, jQuery, CSS/SASS, WebGL, unit testing and automation (Mocha, Jasmine, Webdriver, etc.)
- Any experience in developing games (even as a hobby), Design Patterns, cloud environments (Azure, AWS, etc.), Webpack, Gulp (or Grunt), Agile methodologies would also be helpful
- Fluency in written and spoken English
- Technical leadership skills

What's in it for you?
- Challenging and rewarding work
- Supporting and award-winning working environment
- Homelike and modern office in Tallinn city center
- Benefit package
- Friendly and fun colleagues
- Work in an international team

The studio that we are hiring for produces online casino games that are dramatically different from any that have come before. Using Hollywood-style cinematography, professional actors and a film crew, they create high-quality video clips that we integrate into our games. Because of the connection to the world of film-making, the team includes a strong contingent of video production hotshots - directors, camera operators, editors and the like - in addition to the designers, developers and QA Specialists you'd expect to find in a typical game studio. As pioneers in this radically new genre of games, they get to enjoy the thrill of working on some truly cutting-edge technology, coming up with creative solutions to unexpected hurdles. And all this happens in a fantastic workspace in the heart of Tallinn, Estonia, one of Europe's busiest hubs of tech activity.

We create a new digital platform for online learning and science research. Uniqueness our platform is using active learning methods such as simulation, laboratory, workshops and so on. Our clients are universities abroad and the corporate universities of the big companies.
Headquarters is in Schaffhausen (Switzerland), other offices are in Moscow and Singapore.

We are currently looking for a Senior Frontend Engineer , someone versatile and enthusiastic to take on new problems as we continue to push technology forward.

‚úçÔ∏è You will work on:
 Designing, developing, testing, deploying, maintaining, and improving reliable and scalable cloud-based online learning platform
You will be awesome at this role if you have:
Bachelor's or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience
5+ year experience in JavaScript
2+ year experience in one of the well-known client frameworks: React or Vue.js
Experience in UI testing (unit tests, performance testing)
Experience in UI build stack: npm, webpack etc.
Ability to speak and write in English

üí™ You will be even more awesome if you have:
 Familiarity with learning management systems and/or
An exceptional intellectual drive to go deeper down the online learning rabbit hole
Solid experience in UI testing
Knowledge of UI internationalization (CLDR, globalize, intl)

üëêWe offer:
 100% remote work (office workplace will be an option after epidemic), flexible schedule
International company, English is the primary communication language
Health insurance including kids under 14
Subsidy of home office expenses or lunch (once the office work is reinstated)

üá∫üá∏ –£–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞, –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞

‚è±Ô∏è –ó–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å: –ø–æ—á–∞—Å–æ–≤–∞—è –æ–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞, –æ—Ç 30 —á–∞—Å–æ–≤ –≤ –Ω–µ–¥–µ–ª—é –∏ –¥–æ –±–µ—Å–∫–æ–Ω–µ—á–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏. —Ä–∞—Å—Å–º–∞—Ç—Ä–∏–≤–∞–µ–º —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ long-term.

üíµ 25-35$/—á–∞—Å ~ 3500-6500$/–º–µ—Å—è—Ü

üè¢ –ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è: Bioclinica.com

We create products that evolve traditional approaches and enable the implementation of more sophisticated engineering processes in clinical trials.

Our team consists of experts working on the full life cycle of product development - from sparking an initial idea to business priority scoping, competition analysis, user testing, all leading to software design and development. Our key focus is building a new enterprise distributed platform and new set of products, bringing innovation in the domain that will work as an ecosystem of well-connected and integrated applications and microservices. Together with our partners, we are working on solving problems that will enable a more efficient, synergetic, fast, and secure clinical trial process.

As a frontend developer, you will get the chance to work on developing complex platforms integrating multiple applications involved in clinical trials. You will be part of the team that creates applications and microservices from scratch on an enterprise-level distributed system.

Duties and responsibilities
- Help maintain and improve our medical imaging family of apps.
- Create new standalone application in a microservice manner
- Help improve code quality through writing unit tests, automation and performing code reviews.
- Participate in brainstorming sessions and contribute ideas to our technology, algorithms and products

Qualifications and competencies
- Proven experience in Javascript (Typescript) developer, React
- Understanding of Agile methodologies
- Excellent troubleshooting and communication skills
- Be proficient in both spoken and written English

We think it is a plus if:
- You are interested in expanding your knowledge of clinical processes and trials
- You have a background in biotech or related industries
- You have international work experience
- You have experience with AWS, NodeJS, Ruby/Rails, GraphQL
- You have experience of leading a team

Join our team as we push boundaries and bring innovation in the field of life sciences. At the core of our vision is one goal, and that is creating end-to-end products that enable our clients to focus on what they do best - discover novel types of therapies. As a strongly focused, distributed team we are driven by enthusiasm for working on cutting edge solutions and problems. We are led by problems we must solve to enable our clients amazing breakthroughs in clinical trial phases. If you want to join our mission driven team working on enabling faster improvements in drug discovery send us your CV (telegram @vidyaev )

–û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏:
Our client is the leading digital insurance platform for small and medium-sized businesses. They are dedicated to making insurance simple, fast and convenient so that businesses around the world can get the protection they need and get back to what matters most - growing and managing their business.

Now they are looking for a Senior Frontend Engineer to be part of the Engineering team and help them with their multi-site platform while being an operational enabler for the rest of the organization. The position is open in Krakow.

Must-have:
- 5 years of experience as a JavaScript coder from static design to production running code.
- Responsive design, mobile-first
- Cross-browser compatibility issues knowledge, client-side performance
- Proven experience as a Software Engineer
- Familiarity with Agile development methodologies, and a delivery process based on pull-requests
- Experience with test-driven software design
- Ability to learn new languages and technologies
- Excellent English communication skills
- Team player
- BSc/BA in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field

Nice-to-have:
- AngularJS, React or any other JS libraries are a plus
- Familiar with NoSQL and SQL Data Bases best practices practitioner around service-oriented architectures or microservices
- Knowledge of cloud infrastructure and deployment processes
- Operations as a Service mindset
- Influencing over ordering communication skills
- Out of the-box thinker
- Autonomous learner
Proactive on taking ownership

Company is a new startup based in Tel Aviv, founded by successful repeat entrepreneurs, and funded by top tier VCs in the US. We are working in stealth mode with the ambitious goal of developing a first of its kind, AI-driven financial planning and analysis platform that is set to disrupt the corporate performance management market

In particular, we are searching for an independent and self-driven engineer, with proven system design and hands-on implementation experience, who flourishes in the environment of a young, dynamic startup. You will work closely with the CTO and the first data scientist to build a scalable and secure platform providing high end user experience to our business customers.

As the core dev team grows, you will have the opportunity to take on the technical leadership and be involved in strategy, product, and customer design cycles.

This is a unique opportunity to join a strong founding team during this exciting time of taking a disruptive product to market.

Responsibilities:
Leading R&D infrastructure of backend, frontend, 3rd party integrations and data engineering.
Initiate ideas for continuous improvement of the product functionality and infrastructure.
Assuming responsibility for availability and security of the system.
Build frontend production customer platform

Requirements:
Very strong frontend development experience in React
Experience with backend work - node.js or python, databases
Experience in data visualization
Enthusiastic about code quality, architecture, design, testing, and performance.
Team player, highly motivated, can-do approach.
Capacity to assume a technical leadership role as the core team grows - an advantage.

‚óè 5+ years of experience developing commercial software

RESPONSIBILITY
We are currently looking for Software Developer with experience in building backend services using NodeJS and web applications using ReactJS. Your areas of responsibility will be building the services, data storages and backend infrastructure with the web client application. The ideal candidate will have deep technical expertise and experience in web applications and a proven record of defining and delivering customer value by building and leveraging these applications.

 ‚óè Provide expert level technical knowledge to the team in Sterling Order Management, Java, J2EE, microservice architectures and implementations
‚óè Responsible for delivering quality code meeting the business and technical requirements.
‚óè Responsible for the quality of code developed by the team. Perform code reviews and recommend corrections as necessary. Coach team members in coding and development skills
‚óè Develop a deep understanding of key systems and processes
‚óè Perform a key role in the delivery transformation to an Agile / Scrum methodology
‚óè Provide clear, specific goals to the team and communicate performance feedback regularly through regular 1-1 meetings and performance reviews
‚óè Participate as a member of the engineering leadership in setting and executing strategy for the team
‚óè Estimate development effort, perform resource allocation and plan implementations and system rollouts
‚óè Assist in constantly improving the Engineering organization and making it a great place to work
‚óè Guide and counsel on Williams-Sonoma Inc. policies and procedures related to software development and delivery.
‚óè Performs other duties as required

What You‚Äôll Need:
 ‚óè Extensive skills in implementing, tuning and operating Sterling OMS solution
‚óè Expert skills in several of the following:
‚óè Object-oriented design and development
‚óè Java technologies - J2EE and the Spring framework. Skilled at application performance tuning
‚óè Internet technologies (TCP/IP, HTTP, HTML, CSS, XML, JavaScript)
‚óè Web Information Architecture, including REST principles

‚óè Database storage and interaction (SQL, Oracle, JDBC, "no-SQL" technologies)
‚óè Microservice frameworks and implementations
‚óè Highly knowledgeable and skilled in software development practices and techniques including but not limited to:
‚óè Source code management -- branching, tagging, and merging
‚óè Code reviews and adherence to standards
‚óè Automated unit and integration testing
‚óè Strong understanding of design patterns and best practices implementations. Ability to review and critique proposed designs and offer thoughtful feedback
‚óè An understanding of, and enthusiasm for, SCRUM management techniques
‚óè Ability to express thoughts and ideas in a clear, succinct way -- both oral and written

 Sweetspot

$3500-4500

Sweetspot is a business system for the golf industry where we give the clubs unique knowledge about their own facility while we create the optimal experience for the golfer.

Together with players, clubs, coaches and the whole golf industry we want grow golf by doing the more accessible and attractive to all.

Requirements:
 3+ years of React.js experience;
You follow best practices and conventions;
Responsible and able to work with minimal supervision;
Upper-intermediate English level or above;
You can communicate well with both technical and non-technical clients.

Nice-to-have:

Experience with REST-API.

Responsibilities:
 - The main responsibility for the front-end;
- Connect the backend (REST-API) with the design;
- Build reusable code and libraries for future use;
- Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs;
- Transform visual designs and wireframes into working products;
- Accurate planning of the feature delivery;
- Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders.

Hatch is on a mission to make the world shoppable ! By listing retail purchase options (both online and in-store) on brand websites around the globe, consumers have various buying options at their fingertips with an immediate path to purchase. Our platform imports product inventories from thousands of retailers on a near real-time basis. This allows Hatch to list offers or nearby purchase options for virtually any product worldwide.

We use: JavaScript, CSS, React/Redux, Webpack.

Requirements:
 
 ‚Ä¢

Significant experience with ES6, ES7, ESNext
 ‚Ä¢
Experience in Redux-toolkit, Typescript, Material UI, Storybook is an advantage

Interpersonal skills:
 
 ‚Ä¢
Strong sense of accountability and ownership
 ‚Ä¢
Work well independently and within a team
 ‚Ä¢
Ambition to grow through experience, curiosity to understand new technologies
 ‚Ä¢
Ability to work cross-culturally and across regions
 ‚Ä¢
Excellent communication skills in English.

Benefits: 
 ‚Ä¢
Being part of a very successful fast-growing company
 ‚Ä¢
Top location in Amsterdam
 ‚Ä¢
Very talented and progressive international team
 ‚Ä¢
Agile work environment
 ‚Ä¢

Free fresh fruit and good coffee

26 holidays per year

Excellent training and development opportunities

What we offer:

‚Äî An opportunity to work from anywhere. Our team is distributed worldwide, from Minsk to Manila, from Florida to California

‚Äî A competitive salary
‚Äî And much more!

About you
‚Äî At least 4+ years of development experience with JS
‚Äî Strong experience with React/Redux
‚Äî Knowledge of application architecture
‚Äî Great level of general computer science skills
‚Äî Great communication skills

#–í–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #Senior #React #Part -time #Remote #Ukraine
Position: Senior React JS developer
Location: Ukraine only
Project duration: 3 months with an option to extend the contract
Schedule: 30 hours per week
Hourly rate: 25 USD ‚Äì 30 USD
Company: D-Tech.One
We are looking for a Senior React JS developer to join the project within a task management startup from Germany.
Responsibilities:
- Gather and address technical and design requirements.
- Write well-designed, testable, efficient code.
- Ensure designs are in compliance with specifications.
- Compile and analyze data, processes, and codes to troubleshoot problems and identify areas for improvement.
- Collaborate with backend developers to integrate user-facing elements with server side logic.
- Monitor industry developments and trends.
- Build reusable code and libraries for future use.
Required qualifications:
- Technical background
- 5+ years as a frontend software developer
- 2+ years of react development using redux.
- Software engineering degree or equivalent.
- SQL
- Must have good English and good communication skills.

Contact person: @DEugenika or e.dolia@d-tech.one

–£ –≤—Å–µ—Ö –Ω–∞—Å —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã–µ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—ã, –Ω–æ –æ–±—â–∏–µ —Ü–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ —Ü–µ–ª–∏ ‚Äî –¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å –∫—Ä—É—Ç—ã–µ –≤–µ—â–∏, –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–æ–≤–æ–ª—å—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ –æ—Ç –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–∞, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å –ª—É—á—à–∏–π –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç –≤ –Ω–∞—à–µ–π —Å—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ, —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å, –≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–∏—Ç—å –ø—Ä–∞–≤–¥—É, –ø–æ–∑–∏—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ –≤–ª–∏—è—Ç—å –Ω–∞ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–∞—é—â—É—é —Å—Ä–µ–¥—É –∏ –Ω–µ –ø—Ä–µ–∫—Ä–∞—â–∞—Ç—å —É—á–∏—Ç—å—Å—è.

#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #—É–¥–∞–ª—ë–Ω–∫–∞ #remote #fulltime #react

Senior frontend developer
–ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è: BokaMera
–õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è: remote
–ó–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å: fulltime
–ó/–ø: 2.5-4k $ gross
–ö–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç—ã: @dkrylov –∏–ª–∏ –Ω–∞ –ø–æ—á—Ç—É kristian@bokamera.se

BokaMera is a Swedish company that helps other companies to implement online booking for their business. We provide all sorts of tools for online booking from embeddable widgets and kiosk apps to basic zero-code websites.

Now we are looking for a person who will take the responsibility of making the front side of our services better and will work in close cooperation with our team.

Responsibilities
- Maintain the existing frontend codebase written in React, TypeScript a little bit of Svelte
- Prototype and develop new features and services
- Make the product to be available in 4+ languages and countries (we almost finished this part)
- In the future, move all frontend services to the new GraphQL API

What we expect from a candidate
- Strong expertise in HTML, CSS, React, JavaScript and TypeScript
- Good sense of design and UX
- Interest in working with Svelte/Sapper
- Good time-management and communication skills

üî∏–ù–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏: –∫–∞–¥—Ä–æ–≤–æ–µ –∞–≥–µ–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–æ Toughbyte

Our client is a Silicon Valley based startup of a cloud-based platform designed to outsource information work to robots. The company is set out to change robotic process automation licensing and delivery models by creating a cloud-native platform based on open source technologies, providing users with automated digital routines.
The company is now looking for a Senior JavaScript Developer to lead a new project - building a new browser extension for Chrome for running JavaScript-based automation routines.

üîπKey responsibilities:
- To kick-off and lead a special project directly overseen by the CEO;
- To build a new browser extension for Chrome for running JavaScript-based automation routines;
- Developing open-source libraries.

üîπMust-have skills:
- Extensive experience with JavaScript;
- Some experience with TypeScript
- Experience producing proofs-of-concept;
- Product mindset, hacker mentality, independent thinker with creative problem-solving skills.

üîπNice-to-have skills:
- Browser extension experience;
-Collaboration inside open-source communities.

üìç–ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è: Datagrok ( https://datagrok.ai )
üìç–õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è: USA, PA
üìç–§–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç: —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞, —Ñ—É–ª–ª—Ç–∞–π–º
üìç–í–∏–ª–∫–∞: 1000$ - 2500$

–ö–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç: @alexaprm

Datagrok.ai is looking for a qualified frontend developer to join our strong team of engineers and data scientists. We are a startup developing a next-generation, no-compromises data analytics platform that will revolutionize the industry. Our proprietary technology lets us efficiently process datasets with tens of millions of rows in the browser, and interactively visualize them. We take pride in platform‚Äôs UX and performance, and take advantage of the technologies such as WebAssembly, WebGL, and browser-based multithreaded computations. We have a very well established development process that includes unit tests, continuous integration system, stress tests, integration tests, automated UI testing system, and various deployment options. Our technology stack is primarily based on Dart and Postgres, but also has multiple extension points with components developed in JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, R, Java, and C++. Initially you will be involved in developing new plugins in JavaScript, and extending platform‚Äôs core capabilities to enable that.

There is a lot of room to grow, and there will be many opportunities to assume more responsibilities and learn new domains, such as machine learning, artificial intelligence, or high-performance computing.

This is a remote position.
It would be great if you could send us a project you have developed on your own (github repository is ok), or point to another project you have participated in.

Responsibilities
* Front-end and back-end web development
* Maintain and improve developer-facing platform‚Äôs JS API
* Help our clients write JS applications on top of the Datagrok platform
* Develop proof-of-concept applications
* Integrate third-party JS libraries into the platform

Requirements
* At least two years of professional experience
* JavaScript or TypeScript
* At least one of (Angular, React, Vue)
* Good written English, ability to communicate directly with our clients
* Strong verbal and written communication skills
* Ability to learn and apply new technologies

Nice to have
* One of (Python, R, Java, C#, C++)
* WebGL
* WebAssembly
* Dart
* Machine learning and statistics
* Prior exposure to life sciences is a plus

Who are we looking for
We are looking for a Backend Developer to join our R&D department in Eilat, Israel. Have you ever dreamed of working with a small and capable team in a coastal town on the southern edge of the Negev Desert? Are you interested in creating an eco-friendly product in a domain of logistics and transportation, solving mysteries problems and facing new challenges? If so, the Trucknet team is just the place for you!
Responsibilities 
 ‚Ä¢
Implementing new features and providing support for various microservices.
 ‚Ä¢
Proposing, brainstorming and carrying out refactoring to improve the internal structure of our software.
 ‚Ä¢
Improving the developer experience by constantly bettering our toolbox.
 ‚Ä¢
Advancing deployment/integration infrastructure.
Requirements 
 ‚Ä¢
3+ years of professional experience with backend development.
 ‚Ä¢
Acquaintance with Typescript, OOP Javascript, NodeJS.
 ‚Ä¢
Acquaintance with MongoDB and experience with databases in general.
 ‚Ä¢
Practical skills in software architecture and software design.
Advantages 
 ‚Ä¢
Knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes.
 ‚Ä¢
Understanding the concept of horizontal scaling and what limitations it does impose on the application.
 ‚Ä¢
Strong knowledge of MongoDB, PostgreSQL.
 ‚Ä¢
Experience with CI/CD (we use GitLab CI).
 ‚Ä¢
Experience with test-driven development.
 ‚Ä¢
Experience with AWS.

It's a new company with a long history. We have over twenty years of experience developing software for the pharmaceutical industry, driving their data strategies in the big data revolution.

We are transforming life sciences and healthcare with the power of digital IT. We develop intelligent solutions that provide insights to help our partners make data-driven decisions that innovate drug development and improve patient care. With deep domain knowledge, we combine Advanced Data Analytics, Scientific Knowledge Management, and Best-in-Class Software Engineering to speed up time to market and improve the agility of the research process.
Responsibilities:
Test plans and automated tests creation in order to replicate real-world scenarios to approve the quality of the product;
Participation in reviews (walkthroughs) of technical specifications and help other members of the QA team.
Requirements:
5+ QA experience;
3+ years of experience in JavaScript or TypeScript;
Experience with Webdriver.IO and WebDriver Protocol;
Experience with true cross-browser testing;
Ability to improve the existing testing strategy to follow CI/CD;
Hands-on experience with test cases management tools like QAComplete, Zephyr or TestRail;
English level is from upper-intermediate.

‚öõÔ∏è FocusReactive —ç—Ç–æ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ —Å–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö JS/React/Node.js —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è—é—â–∏—Ö –ª–∏–¥–µ—Ä—Å—Ç–≤–æ, —É—Å–ª—É–≥–∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Å—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –≤ —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–π –ï–≤—Ä–æ–ø–µ. –ú—ã –∏–Ω–≤–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –≤ –æ–ø–µ–Ω—Å–æ—Ä—Å (–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–µ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è), –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ–º —Å–∞–º—ã–µ –±–æ–ª—å—à–∏–µ React –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∏ –≤ –º–∏—Ä–µ (React Summit Amsterdam), –∏ —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏–º –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å —Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞ –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∞ –≤–æ–∫—Ä—É–≥ —Ü–µ–ª–∏ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—å —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–º –î—ç–Ω–æ–º –ê–±—Ä–∞–º–æ–≤—ã–º.

–ò—â–µ–º —Å–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–æ–≤ —Å —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏–º –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–º (–æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ) –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –Ω–∞ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–Ω–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ (–≤ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–º –õ–æ–Ω–¥–æ–Ω) –≤ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Å—É–ª—å—Ç–∞–Ω—Ç–æ–≤-—ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–æ–≤ –ø–æ React/Node.js. –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ–º –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ö –∏ –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ –∏–Ω–≤–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –≤ –æ–±–º–µ–Ω –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–π.

–ó–∞–¥–∞—á–∞ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ - –≤–µ—Å—Ç–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ã –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ –∏—Ö –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏, –∑–∞–∫–ª–∞–¥—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å —Ñ—É–Ω–¥–∞–º–µ–Ω—Ç –∏ –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—É –∏ –æ–±—É—á–∞—è –æ—Ç–¥–µ–ª—ã –ª—É—á—à–∏–º –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–∞–º. –¢–∞–∫ –∂–µ –º—ã —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞–µ–º —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–∏–∑—É –ø–æ JAMStack, Headless CMS –∏ Serveless.

#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #Node .js #middle #senior #fullstackjs #backendjavascript

City of the office: Gent, Belgium
Office job
Full day

Salary range: from 40.000 up to 60.000 euro (Net: 28.000- 36.000 euro) + such Benefits (20.000 euro).

Benefits:

Car with a gas card -¬†8 k ‚Ç¨/yearly:¬† we give you a company car and we cover insurance for it plus additionally, you get gas cards;
Meal vouchers¬†& eco vouchers* -¬† 1.970‚Ç¨/year ;
Hospitalization insurance:¬† you don't need to buy it separately for you and your family, the company covers it for you;
Group insurance ¬†- the additional net amount added ¬† to your pension;
24¬† standard +¬† 12 ¬†days extra holidays: in such way you get a bit more than a month of holidays;
Shares ¬†of the company;
B onus : 10% ¬†of the yearly salary (free of¬†taxes);
270 ‚Ç¨ ¬†wellness budget;
250 ‚Ç¨ ¬†buying power premium;
1.800 ‚Ç¨/year ¬†- courses/study


Calculator: https://www.belgiumtaxcalculator.com/?salary=60000&average=true&zip=&childrenUnderThree=0&childrenOverThree=0

Job Description:

We‚Äôre a¬†huge advertising full-stack JavaScript ¬†company. In the browser, that means React, Angular, and a lot of vanilla ECMAScript as well. On the server side, we run billions (and that's true) of requests through¬† Node.js . For our tests, we use Karma and AVA on CircleCI. Our infrastructure runs primarily on¬† AWS ¬†and we manage it with¬† Terraform . We also heavily use¬† Git ¬†and GitHub.

About you

You have high education: Master's or Bachelor's in Computer Science or Information technology
You're good at English: Upper- Intermediate - advanced.
If you love a good¬† challenge , the video ad tech ecosystem is for you. We spend a lot of time optimizing for scale and performance, as well as getting to the bottom of complex issues.
It‚Äôs great if you already know everything there is to know about JavaScript and the Web, but it‚Äôs not a strict requirement by any means. If you understand software engineering‚Äîpreferably through a Master‚Äôs degree‚Äî, we‚Äôll help you understand our stack. We‚Äôd also love to learn¬† from ¬†your experience in other fields.
Likewise, experience in ad tech helps. Rest assured though, working with us is another great way to learn all about how video ads end up on your screen.
We‚Äôre committed to delivering high quality through¬† agile development . If you‚Äôve already done pair programming, code reviews, and daily stand-ups, you‚Äôll probably fit right in.
We‚Äôre looking for a¬† team player ¬†who isn‚Äôt afraid to¬† express their opinion . It‚Äôs through the continuous exchange of ideas and even the occasional constructive discussion that we usually reach the best decisions for our product, our customers, and our team.
Finally, we pride ourselves on our excellent¬† relationship with our customer‚Äôs engineering team . Maintaining that relationship is a big part of the job, through frequent conversations and by going the extra mile to truly understand the customer‚Äôs needs.
¬†
Requirements
- affinity with the web and web services, and how those are working together
- understanding of the fundamentals of computer science (algorithms, design)
- strong conceptual thinking
- desire to work for big scale (we process hundreds of million video advertisement¬† /day )
- willingness to learn new concepts, paradigms
- English - upper-intermediate

Belgium Recruiting Agency- The Interfaces

You can send your CV to Natalia Eksarova - @NataEks or by email: natalia@theinterfaces.eu

Open to any questions

We are looking for a React Native developer who would be our frontend lead.

Core skills

1) Proven track record with ReactJS, React Native, React Router, Effector/Redux(thunk, saga), Styled-components and Javascript ecosystem as a whole.
2) Experience with mobile app development: iOS and Android.
3) Ability to critically examine code efficiency and suggest optimisation and performance improvements.
4) Practical knowledge of designing and writing code according to best practices.
5) Willingness to carry out A/B testing to find the best possible solution and solve problems in a fast paced environment through proactive involvement in the design process.

Other skills

1) Comfortable working with Rest API on both frontend and server side.
2) Ability to plan and forecast optimal development direction in relation to data logistics and communication with server.
3) Familiar with continuous development (CD) pipelines and processes.
4) Basic knowledge of NodeJS.
5) Extensive knowledge of CSS and ability to quickly turn design concepts into code.
6) Typescript for code maintainability and facilitation of testing.
7) Ability to work independently and closely with other team members.

Personal

1) Self-motivated and genuinely interested in area of expertise.
2) Advanced knowledge of English and Russian.
3) Proven track record of learning and sharing knowledge (Github open source projects, Stack Overflow).
4) Proactive.

Competencies

The software engineer outlined above will take a leading role in the development of our application. Everything involving frontend code: its effectiveness, robustness etc, will be in full responsibility of the frontend developer. The developer will oversee that system and application design are implemented effectively as per material and information provided to the developer. The frontend developer will also be responsible for research and consultation on most effective technologies and solutions to be used in frontend development within the product bounds.
